DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the taste properties of HIV inhibitor
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Men and women of nonchildbearing potential professional sensory panelists Aged between 25 and 80 years History of relevant drug or food allergies, cardiovascular or Central nervous system (CNS) disease, clinically significant pathology, history of mental illness Positive HIV test
